title: Properties and methods of arrays
postscript: Like strings, arrays also have a contains() method: [1, 2, 3].contains(2) is true.
question: This code will evaluate as true â€“ true or false?
correct:
var results = [true, true, false, true]
results.remove(at: 2)
results.count == 3
wrong:
let movies = ["A New Hope", "Empire Strikes Back", "Return of the Jedi"]
movies.index(of: "A New Hope") == 4
